name: Chrome King Gallywix
description: Having taken a 'strategic retreat,' Jastor Gallywix holed up in the halls of the Gallagio. Whatever Gallywix has been working on, it's guaranteed to be powerful, deadly, and capable of crushing any who oppose him.

item.name: Formula: Enchant Weapon - Authority of the Depths
Formula: Enchant Weapon - Authority of the Depths
Formula: Enchant Weapon - Authority of the Depths
Formula: Enchant Weapon - Authority of the Depths

sections.title: Overview
sections.body_text:
Gallywix gains energy over time, activating The House of Chrome's Hspell:469286[Giga Coils] at max capacity. Hspell:469362[Charged Giga Bomb]s brought to Giga Controls trigger a Hspell:469767[Giga Bomb Detonation]. This causes a Hspell:1220846[Control Meltdown] which interrupts Gallywix's Hspell:469286[Giga Coils]. Upon losing both Giga Controls a Hspell:1215209[Sabotage Zone] forms.

Additionally, throughout the encounter Gallywix calls in the most overpaid Darkfuse Cronies to aid him.

As the battle rages on Gallywix alters and augments his arsenal bringing maniacal mayhem.

sections.title: Tanks
sections.body_text:
$bullet;Hspell:466340[Scatterblast Canisters] and Hspell:1214607[Bigger Badder Bomb Blast] affect players in Gallywix's frontal direction.
$bullet;Dying Darkfuse Technicians drop Giga Bombs that go Hspell:1223905[Giga BOOM!] after 40 sec. Gallywix's Hspell:469327[Giga Blast] detonates these immediately.
$bullet;Gallywix release all Hspell:1220290[Trick Shots] upon reaching 10 stacks or when changing primary targets.

sections.title: Healers
sections.body_text:
$bullet;Player affected by Hspell:1220761[Mechengineer's Canisters] detonate on consumption or expiration causing a Hspell:474447[Canister Detonation].
$bullet;Dying Darkfuse Technicians drop Giga Bombs that go Hspell:1223905[Giga BOOM!] after 40 sec. Gallywix's Hspell:469327[Giga Blast] detonates these immediately.
$bullet;Hspell:469362[Charged Giga Bomb]s brought to Giga Controls trigger a Hspell:469767[Giga Bomb Detonation] causing Hspell:1220846[Control Meltdown] which interrupts Gallywix's Hspell:469286[Giga Coils].
$bullet;Hspell:469286[Giga Coils], Hspell:466338[Zagging Zizzler], and Hspell:1214369[TOTAL DESTRUCTION!!!] inflict significant damage.

sections.title: Damage Dealers
sections.body_text:
$bullet;Hspell:465952[Big Bad Buncha Bombs] and Hspell:1214607[Bigger Badder Bomb Blast] additionally trigger Hspell:466158[Sapper's Satchel] and Hspell:1214755[Overloaded Rockets].
$bullet;Dying Darkfuse Technicians drop Giga Bombs that go Hspell:1223905[Giga BOOM!] after 40 sec. Gallywix's Hspell:469327[Giga Blast] detonates these immediately.
$bullet;Hspell:469362[Charged Giga Bomb]s brought to Giga Controls trigger a Hspell:469767[Giga Bomb Detonation] causing Hspell:1220846[Control Meltdown] which interrupts Gallywix's Hspell:469286[Giga Coils].

sections.title: Stage One: The House of Chrome
sections.body_text:
"Take a good look at what gold and goblins can getcha."

Cornered in The House of Chrome Gallywix stands ready to blast foes.

sections.title: Stage Two: Mechanical Maniac
sections.body_text:
"Supply and demand! Deal with it!"

Gallywix moves about The House of Chrome calling in Darkfuse cronies.

sections.title: Darkfuse Technician
sections.body_text: Upon death drops a Giga Bomb.

sections.title: Intermission: Docked and Loaded
sections.body_text: Upon reaching 50% health Gallywix drops into the arena Hspell:1214226[Cratering] any in his way, gaining Hspell:1214229[Armageddon-class Plating] and then casts Hspell:1214369[Total Destruction!!!] until interrupted.

sections.title: Stage Three: What an Arsenal!
sections.body_text:
"You certainly don't get your likeness carved into the side of a mountain by letting others push you around"

Gallywix continues to pummel his enemies with his upgraded arsenal.

sections.title: Darkfuse Technician
sections.body_text: Upon death drops a Giga Bomb.

sections.title: Intermission: Docked and Loaded
sections.body_text: Gallywix drops into the arena Hspell:1214226[Cratering] any in his way, gaining Hspell:1214229[Armageddon-class Plating] and then casts Hspell:1214369[Total Destruction!!!] until interrupted.

sections.title: Stage One: What an Arsenal!
sections.body_text:
"You certainly don't get your likeness carved into the side of a mountain by letting others push you around"

Gallywix pummels his enemies with his upgraded arsenal.

sections.title: Giga-Juiced Technician
sections.body_text: Upon death drops a Discharged Giga Bomb.
